summary: WHEN DRIVEN AT HIGHWAY SPEEDS, THE STEERING VIBRATED.   THE DRIVESHAFT WAS REPLACED, AND THE PROBLEM  STILL RECURRED.   *AK   WHEN THE VEHICLE WAS BACKED UP, A THUMP WAS FELT ON EVERY REVOLUTION ON THE DRIVERS SIDE.  THE AXLES WERE REPLACED, BUT THE PROBLEM REMAINED THE SAME.  THE CONSUMER FELT A LOSS OF CONTROL WITH THE VEHICLE ON TURNS, AND A SQUEAKING SOUND HAD COME FROM THE TIRES DUE TO PITTED ROTORS.   *SCC    *JB
